comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://tw.news.yahoo.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftw.news.yahoo.com%2F) ### Comment > Turning on AdGuard Yahoo News will cause an error ! > Disable AdGuard and it will return to normal . ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/q7c4lxjpb6swccg8w8o8wogkkkwkkg82esp3o73t2x.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/hsf99jckplc8sc0k8cs4g0g4scwkgocfm8i4ngm8zc.png?nc=1)

issue.title: maps.yandex.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://yandex.ru/maps/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyandex.ru%2Fmaps%2F) ### Comment > Пропущен баннер рекламы в Яндекс Картах слева. На втором скриншоте видно как с этим справляется RU AdList Username: `@aturtsev` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cyllpdty6jkgw40s4oc8ssoggcwwkwwleml3pvz3io.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/g67j1azcle0444swsogs840w8co0ckwamxgao4o5i0.png?nc=1)

AdGuard Base
